name: Tewitter
description:
Simple Twitter style by my taste.
Notes:
- Dashboard on the right
- Slightly realigned top menu bar
- Slightly widened timeline.
- Removed transparent background image
- I blocked "who to follow" in AdBlock, so it is not affected by this style.
additional_info:
0.3.2
Small fix on profile page ("me" and other users).
0.3.1
Fixed search page title
0.3
Rewritten styles, fixed search and user profile, please update.
Known bugs: top menu still needs proper alignment, with 96% page width works correct.
0.2.1
Fixed user profile page
0.2
Added option for page width
0.1
First public release
Known bugs: search page, user profile.
